content: **featured in the team spirit blog hop 1 ** are you ready to tackle your next crochet project look no further than our fabulous football bunting crochet pattern designed especially for fellow yarn enthusiasts and football fanatics alike this crochet football garland pattern is perfect for crocheters of all levels whether you re an advanced beginner or a seasoned pro with comprehensive easy-to-follow written instructions and a pattern chart to show you the stitches and where to put the laces you ll be crafting your own football-themed bunting with ease skill level advanced beginner size approximately 6 3/4 wide x 8 1/4 high 17 1cm x 21 0cm materials needed worsted weight yarn such as lion brand 24/7 cotton - 2 colors g 4mm hook yarn needle scissors gauge 15 stitches x 15 row = 4 square all of my patterns are written using us terms all of my patterns are tested by experienced pattern testers to ensure the pattern is easy to follow they are professionally edited to minimize errors and ensure the wording is consistent with industry standards making it easy for you to read become a remington lane crochet vip subscribe to our newsletter today and be the first to get new patterns tips and tricks right to your inbox https //remingtonlane com/subscribe 2 due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //remingtonlane com/team-spirit-crochet-projects/ 2 https //remingtonlane com/subscribe
